hadith1.title: وضوء | The Beautiful Way of Wudhu
hadith1.summary: Demonstration of proper wudhu technique starting with intention and praise of water's purity

steps.arabic: بَيْنَا أَمِيرُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ (عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ) ذَاتَ يَوْمٍ جَالِساً مَعَ ابْنِ الْحَنَفِيَّةِ إِذْ قَالَ: يَا مُحَمَّدُ ائتِنِي بِإِنَاءٍ فِيهِ مَاءٌ أَتَوَضَّأْ لِلصَّلَاةِ
steps.translation: While the Commander of the Faithful (peace be upon him) was sitting one day with Ibn al-Hanafiyyah, he said: 'O Muhammad, bring me a vessel with water so I may perform ablution for prayer.'

steps.arabic: فَأتَاهُ مُحَمَّدٌ بِالْمَاءِ فَأَكْفَأَ بِيَدِهِ الْيُمْنَى عَلَى يَدِهِ الْيُسْرَى ثُمَّ قَالَ: بِسْمِ الله الْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي جَعَلَ الْمَاءَ طَهُوراً وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْهُ نَجِساً
steps.translation: Muhammad brought him the water, and he poured his right hand over his left hand, then said: 'In the name of Allah. Praise be to Allah, Who made water purifying and not impure.'

hadith2.title: وضوء | Wudhu Wisdom from the Prophet
hadith2.summary: Essential teachings on the spiritual significance of ablution rituals

steps.arabic: هذا هو الحديث الثاني للوضوء، الخطوة الأولى
steps.translation: This is the second hadith, step one.

supplication1.title: الدعاء بالتوبة | Supplication on Confession
supplication1.summary: Heartfelt prayer acknowledging human imperfection and seeking divine mercy

steps.translation: And among his prayers (upon him be peace)

steps.arabic: فِي الِاعْتِرَافِ وَطَلَبِ التَّوْبَةِ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى
steps.translation: in confession and seeking repentance from Allah, the Exalted:

steps.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ يَحْجُبُنِي عَنْ مَسْأَلَتِكَ خِلَالٌ ثَلَاثٌ، وَتَحْدُونِي عَلَيْهَا خَلَّةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
steps.translation: O Allah, three traits prevent me from asking You, yet one trait compels me:

steps.arabic: يَحْجُبُنِي أَمْرٌ أَمَرْتَ بِهِ فَأَبْطَأْتُ عَنْهُ
steps.translation: What prevents me is a command You ordered, but I delayed in obeying;
a prohibition You forbade, but I hastened toward it;

steps.arabic: وَنِعْمَةٌ أَنْعَمْتَ بِهَا عَلَيَّ فَقَصَّرْتُ فِي شُكْرِهَا
steps.translation: and a blessing You bestowed, but I fell short in gratitude.

steps.arabic: وَيَحْدُونِي عَلَى مَسْأَلَتِكَ تَفَضُّلُكَ عَلَى مَنْ أَقْبَلَ بِوَجْهِهِ إِلَيْكَ
steps.translation: What compels me is Your grace toward those who turn to You
and approach You with good hope.
For all Your benevolence is grace,
and all Your favors are initiated by You alone.

steps.arabic: فَهَا أَنَا ذَا، يَا إِلَهِي وَاقِفٌ بِبَابِ عِزِّكَ وُقُوفَ المُسْتَسْلِمِ الذَّلِيلِ
steps.translation: Here I stand, my God, at the door of Your might—humbled and surrendered—

steps.arabic: وَسَائِلُكَ عَلَى الحَيَاءِ مِنِّي سُؤَالَ البَائِسِ المُعِيلِ
steps.translation: asking You despite my shame, like a destitute beggar.

steps.arabic: مُقِرٌّ لَكَ بِأَنِّي لَمْ أَسْتَسْلِمْ وَقْتَ إِحْسَانِكَ إِلَّا بِالْإِقْلَاعِ عَنْ عِصْيَانِكَ
steps.translation: I confess I only refrained from disobedience during Your blessings,

steps.arabic: وَلَمْ أَخْلُ فِي الحَالاتِ كُلِّهَا مِنِ امْتِنَانِكَ
steps.translation: and in all states, I was never deprived of Your favors.

steps.arabic: فَهَلْ يَنْفَعُنِي، يَا إِلَهِي إِقْرَارِي عِنْدَكَ بِسُوءِ مَا اكْتَسَبْتُ
steps.translation: Will my admission of the evils I committed benefit me, O my God?

steps.arabic: وَهَلْ يُنْجِينِي مِنْكَ اعْتِرَافِي لَكَ بِقَبِيحِ مَا ارْتَكَبْتُ
steps.translation: Will confessing my sins save me from Your punishment?

steps.arabic: أَمْ أَوْجَبْتَ لِي فِي مَقَامِي هَذَا سُخْطَكَ
steps.translation: Or have You decreed wrath upon me in this state?

steps.arabic: أَمْ لَزِمَنِي فِي وَقْتِ دُعَايَ مَقْتُكَ
steps.translation: Or has Your disdain become my fate as I supplicate?

steps.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ لَا أَيْأَسُ مِنْكَ وَقَدْ فَتحْتَ لِي بَابَ التَّوْبَةِ إِلَيْكَ
steps.translation: Glory to You! I do not despair, for You opened repentance’s door to me.

steps.arabic: بَلْ أَقُولُ مَقَالَ العَبْدِ الذَّلِيلِ الظَّالِمِ لِنَفْسِهِ
steps.translation: Instead, I speak as the humble servant who wronged himself,
who disregarded his Lord’s sanctity—
whose sins grew immense,
and whose days passed him by.

steps.arabic: حَتَّى إِذَا رَأَى مُدَّةَ العَمَلِ قَدِ انْقَضَتْ
steps.translation: When he saw his time for deeds had ended,
and his lifespan reached its limit—

steps.arabic: وَأَيْقَنَ أَنَّهُ لَا مَحِيصَ لَهُ مِنْكَ
steps.translation: and he knew there was no escape from You,
nor refuge from Your judgment—
he turned to You in repentance,
sincerely seeking Your pardon.
He stood before You with a pure heart,
and called You with a trembling, faint voice.
He lowered himself in humility,
bowing his head in submission.
Fear made his legs tremble,
and tears flooded his cheeks.
He pleads: “O Most Merciful of the Merciful!
O Most Compassionate to those who seek mercy!

steps.arabic: وَيَا أَعْطَفَ مَنْ أَطَافَ بِهِ المُسْتَغْفِرُونَ
steps.translation: O Kindest to those who beg forgiveness!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ عَفْوُهُ أَكْثرُ مِنْ نَقِمَتِهِ
steps.translation: O You whose forgiveness exceeds Your wrath!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ رِضَاهُ أَوْفَرُ مِنْ سَخَطِهِ
steps.translation: O You whose pleasure outweighs Your displeasure!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ تَحَمَّدَ إِلَى خَلْقِهِ بِحُسْنِ التَّجَاوُزِ
steps.translation: O You who boasts to creation of Your gracious pardon!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ عَوَّدَ عِبَادَهُ قَبُولَ الإِنَابَةِ
steps.translation: O You who taught Your servants to accept repentance!
O You who reforms the corrupt through repentance!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ رَضِيَ مِنْ فِعْلِهِمْ بِالْيَسِيرِ
steps.translation: O You who is pleased with their slightest good!
O You who multiplies their small deeds!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ ضَمِنَ لَهُمْ إِجَابَةَ الدُّعَاءِ
steps.translation: O You who guarantees their prayers’ response!

steps.arabic: وَيَا مَنْ وَعَدَهُمْ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ بِتَفَضُّلِهِ حُسْنَ الجَزَاءِ
steps.translation: O You who promises them, by Your grace, the finest reward!

steps.arabic: مَا أَنَا بِأَعْصَى مَنْ عَصَاكَ فَغَفَرْتَ لَهُ
steps.translation: I am not the worst sinner You forgave,

steps.arabic: وَمَا أَنَا بِأَلْوَمِ مَنِ اعْتَذَرَ إِلَيْكَ فَقَبِلْتَ مِنْهُ
steps.translation: nor the most blameworthy whose apology You accepted,

steps.arabic: وَمَا أَنَا بِأَظْلَمِ مَنْ تَابَ إِلَيْكَ فَعُدْتَ عَلَيْهِ
steps.translation: nor the most unjust whom You restored after repentance.

steps.arabic: أَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ فِي مَقَامِي هَذَا تَوْبَةَ نَادِمٍ
steps.translation: I repent to You now—regretful for my negligence,

steps.arabic: عَلَى مَا فَرَطَ مِنْهُ، مُشْفِقٍ مِمَّا اجْتَمَعَ عَلَيْهِ
steps.translation: fearful of my accumulated sins,
and ashamed of my misdeeds.

steps.arabic: عَالِمٍ بِأَنَّ العَفْوَعَنِ الذَّنْبِ العَظِيمِ لَا يَتَعَاظَمُكَ
steps.translation: I know forgiving grave sins does not burden You,

steps.arabic: وَأَنَّ التَّجَاوُزَ عَنِ الإِثْمِ الجَلِيلِ لَا يَسْتَصْعِبُكَ
steps.translation: overlooking immense wrongs does not trouble You,

steps.arabic: وَأَنَّ احْتِمَالَ الجِنَايَاتِ الفَاحِشَةِ لَا يَتَكَأَّدُكَ
steps.translation: and bearing heinous crimes does not weary You.

steps.arabic: وَأَنَّ أَحَبَّ عِبَادِكَ إِلَيْكَ مَنْ تَرَكَ الِاسْتِكْبَارَ عَلَيْكَ
steps.translation: Your most beloved servants are those who renounce arrogance,
abandon stubbornness, and cling to seeking forgiveness.

steps.arabic: وَأَنَا أَبْرَأُ إِلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنْ أَسْتَكْبِرَ
steps.translation: I disavow arrogance before You,
seek refuge from persistence in sin,
ask forgiveness for my shortcomings,

steps.arabic: وَأَسْتَعِينُ بِكَ عَلَى مَا عَجَزْتُ عَنْهُ
steps.translation: and seek Your aid in my helplessness.
O Allah, bless Muhammad and his family,

steps.arabic: وَهَبْ لِي مَا يَجِبُ عَلَيَّ ذلَكَ
steps.translation: grant me what I need,
spare me from what I deserve,
and save me from the terrors of the wicked.
You overflow with pardon,
are sought for forgiveness,
and renowned for mercy.
None but You can fulfill my needs,
none but You can forgive my sins.

steps.arabic: حَاشَاكَ، وَلَا أَخَافُ عَلَى نَفْسِي إِلَّا إِيَّاكَ
steps.translation: Far be it from You! I fear none but You.
You alone deserve reverence and pardon.
Bless Muhammad and his family,
fulfill my need,
grant my request,
forgive my sin,
and ease my fears.
You are capable of all things,
and this is easy for You.
Amen, Lord of the Worlds.
